Package product

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CatalogItem
    This class stores the data of a catalogItem - a product with image to appear in catalog
    EditableProductView
    Entity to enable storing products in tableview objects in order to show them in gui
    EditProductGUI
    Provides a GUI to edit products info
    NewProductCreationGUI
    Provides a gui for the creation of a new product
    ProdcutController
    Provides functions that Manages the Prodcut
    Product
    The Product Entity holds all the information for the Product table
